QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT ENROLID, SEX, DOBYR, DTSTART, DTEND, SUBSTRING(RIGHT('00000000000' + cast(ENROLID as VARCHAR), 11), 1,9) Family, CASE PLANTYP WHEN 1 THEN '{prefix} Basic/Major Medical' WHEN 2 THEN '{prefix} Comprehensive' WHEN 3 THEN '{prefix} EPO' WHEN 4 THEN '{prefix} HMO' WHEN 5 THEN '{prefix} POS' WHEN 6 THEN '{prefix} PPO' WHEN 7 THEN '{prefix} POS with Capitation' WHEN 8 THEN '{prefix} CDHP' WHEN 9 THEN '{prefix} HDHP' ELSE '{prefix} Other' END as ps, DATATYP, EGEOLOC, 44814722 PeriodTypeConceptId, CASE WHEN MHSACOVG IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE MHSACOVG END AS VALUE_AS_NUMBER, case when RX = '1' then 0 else 1 end as missinginsurance, RX FROM {sc}.ENROLLMENT_DETAIL JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND ENROLID = ch.PERSON_ID)
select a.*, CASE WHEN a.DATATYP IN (2,4) THEN 'C ' ELSE 'N ' END + ps PayerSource, 900000010 AS OBSERVATION_CONCEPT_ID, 'MHSACOVG' AS OBSERVATION_SOURCE_VALUE, {vendor}, null PLANKEY, null RACE_SOURCE_VALUE, null RACE_CONCEPT_ID, null ETHNICITY_SOURCE_VALUE, null ETHNICITY_CONCEPT_ID, e2.ENROLID as baby_person_id, min(CAST((CAST(e2.DOBYR AS VARCHAR) + '-' + DATEPART(MONTH, e2.DTSTART) + '-01') AS DATE)) as baby_dob from a left join {sc}.ENROLLMENT_DETAIL e2 on a.ENROLID != e2.ENROLID and a.SEX = '2' and a.RX = '1' and e2.RX = '1' and a.Family = SUBSTRING(RIGHT('00000000000' + cast(e2.ENROLID as VARCHAR), 11), 1,9) and e2.DOBYR - a.DOBYR >= 12 and e2.DOBYR - DATEPART(YEAR, e2.DTSTART) = 0 group by a.enrolid, a.sex, a.dobyr, a.dtstart, a.dtend, a.family, a.ps, a.datatyp, a.egeoloc, a.periodtypeconceptid, a.value_as_number, a.missinginsurance, a.rx, payersource, observation_concept_id, observation_source_value, vendor, plankey, race_source_value, race_concept_id, ethnicity_source_value, ethnicity_concept_id, e2.ENROLID ORDER BY ENROLID
